SE 傳聞
https://www.macrumors.com/2018/05/14/iphone-se-2-not-finalized-macotakara/

重點：
Mac Otakara表示
1. 收到風賣中國手機配件既商家話SE2未開始整
2. Apple重考慮緊唔同prototype design
3. 其中包括X款全面屏
4. 或者現有完全touch id款但玻璃底

case maker Olixar表示
5. se2款會係X款 但係aluminium底(無無線充電)
6. 同埋短m字額(無face id)

配件廠都相信
7. se2好可能係第三季出 9月連同第二代X同X plus一齊出

寫文果個表示
8. 堆配件廠可能撈亂左下年出6.1 inch款既iphone當左做se2
9. apple故意放假消息 伏班爆料廠
10. 但無論點se2都一定會出 唔係唔會咁多料爆 即係7分假都有3分真

目前睇se2 9月出既機會大好多 或者咁講 即使6月出se2 九月都會有一部低價版X款出現 大家可以等等先

//iPhoneHacks Readers: Tell Us Your iOS 12 Wishlist
Posted by Gautam Prabhu on May 27, 2018 in iOS 12

iOS 12 Features
Apple has sent out invites for the WWDC 2018 keynote on June 4 this week where the Cupertino based company is widely expected to preview iOS 12, the twelfth major update for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

I am very excited as it is one of the most awaited events of the year. I can’t wait to see what Apple has in store for us. We don’t know a lot about the update, but we’ve heard some interesting rumors that have provided details about some of the new features and changes that we can expect to see in iOS 12.

But I really hope Apple has some major surprises for us. Over the last few months, we have brought you some of the features we would like to see in iOS 12 such as third-party support in Control Center, improvements in FaceTime and Messages apps, a better Notification Center, Siri feature parity and extension overhaul, improvements for iPhone X, new iCloud features and more free storage.

Are you looking forward to WWDC Keynote? We would love to know which features and improvements you will like to see in iOS 12 so we can share it with your fellow readers.
//

Wishlist: fix the bugssssssssssssss, save power ~完~

外國網站分享 iOS 12 概念設計　顯示全新多功能鎖定畫面

iHelp BR 網站為 iOS 12 進行概念設計，他們主要在鎖定畫面出發，為用戶脅來更多功能，在 iPhone X 的鎖定畫面，除了可以看到時間、通知、和下面左個捷徑之外，iHelp BR 認為應該要在鎖定介面加入類似 Widget 的「Complications」，以圓形圖示和長形圖示例如顯示未接電話、天氣、股價資訊、提醒事項、音樂 App 捷徑等等，並以 iPhone X 的 OLED 螢幕的特性支援 Always on 介面，即使「關掉」螢幕，也能顯示基本資訊。




https://www.newmobilelife.com/2018/05/29/ios-12-concept-design-lockscreen/

iHelp BR 網站為 iOS 12 進行概念設計，他們主要在鎖定畫面出發，為用戶脅來更多功能，在 iPhone X 的鎖定畫面，除了可以看到時間、通知、和下面左個捷徑之外，iHelp BR 認為應該要在鎖定介面加入類似 Widget 的「Complications」，以圓形圖示和長形圖示例如顯示未接電話、天氣、股價資訊、提醒事項、音樂 App 捷徑等等，並以 iPhone X 的 OLED 螢幕的特性支援 Always on 介面，即使「關掉」螢幕，也能顯示基本資訊。




https://www.newmobilelife.com/2018/05/29/ios-12-concept-design-lockscreen/

Unfortunately, some Telegram features, such as stickers, don’t work correctly under iOS 11.4 that was just released – even though we fixed this issue weeks ago.

Apple has been preventing Telegram from updating its iOS apps globally ever since the Russian authorities ordered Apple to remove Telegram from the App Store. Russia banned Telegram on its territory in April because we refused to provide decryption keys for all our users’ communications to Russia’s security agencies. We believe we did the only possible thing, preserving the right of our users to privacy in a troubled country.

Unfortunately, Apple didn’t side with us. While Russia makes up only 7% of Telegram’s userbase, Apple is restricting updates for all Telegram users around the world since mid-April. As a result, we’ve also been unable to fully comply with GDPR for our EU-users by the deadline of May 25, 2018. We are continuing our efforts to resolve the situation and will keep you updated.

Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
